Content: Reload your <font color='#C7A758'>Pistol</font>, instantly refreshing the <font color='#CCFF22'>Shoot Pistol</font> skill.
Shoot your equipped pistol at a target, dealing [1].[Special:LLWEAPONEX_PistolRuneEffects]
Shoot your equipped pistol in a straight line, dealing [1].<font color='#FF9922'>The bullet will travel well beyond your limited targeting range.</font>[Special:LLWEAPONEX_PistolRuneEffects]
